channel.title: Home on Coeur d'Alene Tech Group
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Coeur d'Alene Tech Group

item.title: Attend
item.description: Attend a Meeting We have monthly meetups at rotating venues around Kootenai County, Idaho. These meet ups are scheduled on the Meetup.com page to track attendance. We also have a Slack group to chat in between the monthly meetups. You can request an automatic invite.

item.title: Present
item.description: Give a Presentation We feature presentations on a monthly basis and always welcome more topics. If you are interested in presenting then tell us the title, brief summary of your proposed presentation, and a brief bio about yourself. Please see past Meetups for examples. Submit your proposal

item.title: Slack
item.description: Slack Channel We have a Slack channel to chat in between the monthly meetups. You can request an automatic invite.

item.title: First Tech Talk Night
item.description: Come join us for our inaugural Tech Talk Night and learn something new from our three presentations. This is a new format and will be recurring monthly going forward. Introduction to Elixir By Karmen Blake Come get an introduction to a language whose syntax and ecosystem are top-notch and actively been in development since 2012. Built on top of the BEAM (Erlang Virtual Machine) it relies on decades of industry-strength stability of Erlang.

item.title: Attributions
item.description: Attributions Calendar icon Created by Hrbon from the Noun Project Presentation icon Created by Adrien Coquet from the Noun Project Slack icon Created by Henning Gross from the Noun Project

item.title: Contact
item.description: Reach out to the organizer If you have a question or comment, feel free to use the form below or email dakotah@lakedistrict.space Name Email Your Message

item.title: July Meeting Recap
item.description: We had a great turnout for July. Several new folks showed up from different tech related industries like home automation. How to Find The Group I’m not sure if everybody who RSVPed was in attendance and I apologize if you missed the notification of where to find us. I had sent out a notification to those that were planning to attend around 2pm and then a couple more people RSVPed and didn’t get the notification.

item.title: Upcoming Meeting on Thursday
item.description: As a reminder, we have an upcoming meeting this Thursday, July 12, 2018 at 6:00pm. The venue this time around is Mad Bomber Brewing in Hayden. Further details on how to find the group will be sent out the day of the meeting. Mad Bomber Brewing 9265 N Government Way Hayden, ID 83835
